buildCommand: if [ "$VERCEL_ENV" = "production" ]; then if ! command -v supabase &> /dev/null; then npm install -g supabase; fi && export SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN="$SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN" && export SUPABASE_DB_PASSWORD="$SUPABASE_DB_PASSWORD" && supabase link --project-ref "$SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF" && supabase db push --password "$SUPABASE_DB_PASSWORD"; fi && pnpm run build
